<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Collaborative Modeling and Visualization</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <A NAME=HEADING50> </A> <A HREF="AR95Book-51.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-49.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-48.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-51.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-49.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-48.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> <IMG ALIGN = TOP SRC="shastraLs.gif"><IMG ALIGN = TOP SRC="colModVisRjT.gif"><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> This laboratory houses the development of SHASTRA, a distributed and collaborative modeling and visualization multimedia environment. This software system supports multi-stage scientific problem solving, involving simultaneous interactions from multiple persons and multimedia communications. Current applications include custom design of hip and knee prosthesis, shape optimization of engine-wing connections, and molecular "docking" strategies for drug screening. The laboratory currently includes one Power Indigo Onyx RE2, six Silicon Graphics Indigo 2 workstations, two Indy stations, one HP- 715/75 CRX48Z graphics stations with a graphics Turbo upgrade, one IBM R-6000, one IBM Power PC 604e, one Pentium, two Power Macintoshes, and two Sun SPARCstations configured for multimedia (audio/video) communications.<P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-51.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-49.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-48.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-51.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-49.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-48.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
